name: Dinner Defense
description:
Defend your restaurant from the food critics that want to ruin your reputation.

Prepare the food they ask before they get to the table and keep your stars. If you lose all of them, it's over.

Controls:

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move. Space to interact.

Recipes(didn't have time to explain them in game:

  1. Salad = Sliced tomato + sliced lettuce
  2. Grilled steak = meat into oven*
  3. Steak and potatoes = meat into oven + potato into oven*
  4. Sliced cooked meat = sliced meat into oven*

*only one ingredient at once, take them with the plate.
